enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Graduate Students.
title: SoC COMM_ST 525-0-20 Seminar-Problems in Comm Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This seminar focuses on public commemoration as a rhetorical phenomenon. Seminar participants will read and discuss contemporary rhetorical scholarship on commemoration and will practice skills in critical reading and analysis. Students who successfully complete this course should expect to be conversant in the disciplinary vocabularies of commemorative rhetorical practice and should expect to have produced an essay-length critical work.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Dunn, Thomas R. Queerly Remembered: Rhetorics for Remembering the GLBTQ Past. Columbia: University of South Carolina Press, 2016.

subject: COMM_ST
